import sys as s
test=int(s.stdin.readline())
while test:
    n=int(s.stdin.readline())
    wtOfPie=[int(i) for i in s.stdin.readline().split()]
    wtLimitOfPie=[int(i) for i in s.stdin.readline().split()]

    wtLimitOfPie.sort()
    ##print"wt limitof pie ",wtLimitOfPie
    i=0
    j=0
    ##print"before while"
    while j<n:
        if wtOfPie[i]<=wtLimitOfPie[j]:
            ##print"value of i ",i
            ##print"if i<n wtOfPie ",wtOfPie[i],"is not ",wtLimitOfPie[j]
            ##print"value of j ",j
            i=i+1
            j=j+1
        else:
            ##print"else"
            j=j+1
    print i
    test-=1
